text: Dimitris Frangopoulos (Greek: Δημήτρης Φραγκόπουλος) was a Greek tennis player. He competed at the 1896 Summer Olympics in Athens. Frangopoulos was defeated in the first round of the singles tournament by Momcsilló Tapavicza of Hungary. This put him in a six-way tie for eighth place in the field of thirteen players. He did not compete in the doubles tournament. ==References== Category:Greek male tennis players Category:Olympic tennis players of Greece Category:Tennis players at the 1896 Summer Olympics Category:19th-century male tennis players Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Dimitris Frangopoulos
